channel.title: ISP - Image and Signal Processing group
channel.description: Recent content on ISP - Image and Signal Processing group

item.title: César Luis Aybar
item.description: I am working on the development of machine learning techniques for super-resolution in the ESA OpenSR project. My background is in Earth Observation.

item.title: Freddie Kalaitzis
item.description: University of Oxford - UK. OATML - Dept of Computer Science

item.title: Simon Donike
item.description: I am working on the development of machine learning techniques for super-resolution in the ESA OpenSR project. My background is in Earth Observation.

item.title: Luis Gómez-Chova
item.description: My interests are related to machine learning and signal and image processing. The application domains are remote sensing data analysis and hyperspectral images with special focus on cloud screening.
